archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create Customized Product Offering to Purchase
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Create a customized offering to purchase based on standard product offerings available.

properties.value: Create Customized Product Offering to Purchase develops a customized offering that may be a bundle. The content of the bundle may be based on rules defined for creating the customized offering. A price for the customized offering may also be determined (not chosen).
